channel.title: Payne to the Max
channel.description: [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/3592386/max.jpg[/img] From a sudden mood strike, I decided to screenshoot all of the graphic novel pages from the first Max Payne. I took the shots as I played through in Hard Boiled, took 4 hours to finish ingame, and maybe 1 hour in total to edit the images (I removed the buttons from the bottom bar). [url='https://www.dropbox.com/gallery/3592386/1/Payne%20to%20the%20Max?h=5b57d9']Payne to the Max[/url]

item.title: Payne to the Max
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I always wanted to do that but im too lazy. Good work.

Also I loved the soundtrack of the first game.
